channel.title: A few Q's about my server if u help u
channel.description:
ok how do i make people admin and myself i cant see my shops and there not even on mini map
if u help u will become admin or co-owner

item.title: A few Q's about my server if u help u
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ok to make ppl admin/mod goto Characters folder in ur source and then find ur name and serach for character rights and 1-Mod 2-Admin 3-Owner 4-Invisable Admin

and did u spawn the npc for shop?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 08, 2007, 07:52:47 PM[/size][hr]Shows how To Make NPC Reeswpan And Make Em Talk! Enjoy! AND To Add Shops Go here:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

1st goto autorespawn.cfg whcih can be found in the CFG File or config file put this in:

spawn = 553	3290	3889	0	0	0	0	0	1	Pk_Supplies

553 is the npcs code 3290 is the X-coord 3889 Is the y-coord coords are were they npc is spwned…to find it in the game type ::coordson

the 5 zeros are othing for u to worry about as i see u dont know how to do this… just leave the 1 a 1…
and Pk_Supples thts just nothig…it wont effect shit.

…and to make a npc you goto NpcHandler.JAVA
Serach:

moo

and after the }
put this in:

if (misc.random2(30) == 286) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Do You See The Light? I Created It....It Can Do Many Things....Trust Me!"; } }
the 286 is the Id for ur NPc…change it… and the

npcs[i].textUpdate = "Do You See The Light? I Created It…It Can
change wats in the " " to wat ever u want it to say…

HOpe i helped!

Read full topic
item.source: A few Q's about my server if u help u

item.title: A few Q's about my server if u help u
item.dc:creator: @icepick776 icepick776
item.description:
@icepick776 wrote:

to make admin go to character file click on your name go down find player rights=

1=mod, 2=admin, 3=owner, change yours to 3

[edit] sorry left out for your shops if you have them configured u may not have them in the right coordinates go to your autospawn.cfg, look for the id of the npc that has the shop you want, then change the firt to #s you see which are the coordinates to what ever coordinates you want them to be at. the 1st # = x coord. 2nd # = y coord.

Read full topic
